Name: Dungeon Rummage - Tiqee's Escape
About the game: Join Tiqee, a Human/Goblin half breed, on her adventures to escape the dungeon of Echeia. Find hidden rooms, use the hook to overcome obstacles and fight your way through enemies with a twist on the turn based formula. Manage your bot companions rather than doing everything yourself. Find and collect tools to improve your skills & craft items to improve your bot companions. Each bot has two distinct modifications, completely changing how they act in combat. The game features around 3-5 hours of gameplay. Are you just an adventurer or are you a Platin-Gobbo? Beating the game will unlock a code for you in the future that can be used in Dungeon Rummage - Another Isekai?! And unlocking all achievements rewards even more goodies!
